alert.name: Secret Detector- increase in ERROR_COUNTER count

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "ERROR_COUNTER" WHERE "subsystem" = 'pipes-secret-detector' AND "fqClass" = 'com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-com-expedia-www-haystack-pipes-secretDetector-actions-EmailerDetectedAction' AND "lineNumber" = '105' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

alert.message:
Kafka reads have gone below the threshold limit. Possible causes:
a) span-collector is not pushing the spans to Kafka.
b) Kafka may be down.
alert.name: Secret Detector- increase in Kafka lag

targets.query: SELECT sum("heapMemoryUsage.used") FROM "haystack.pipes.secret-detector" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("SPAN_ARRIVAL_MS_GAUGE_max") FROM "haystack.pipes.haystack-pipes-secret-detector" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
